title: 534. How to Document Your Creations
description:
Learn how to document your quilts, so that their basic information, their stories, and their connections with others are remembered and shared through generations. We also share listener-submitted sewing hacks, tips for saving money in your sewing space, and quilty items on our wish list.
For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here: https://www.allpeoplequilt.com/magazines-more/quilting-podcast/episode-534-how-to-document-your-creations
Email us at APQPodcast@meredith.com.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:author: American Patchwork & Quilting
itunes:subtitle: Record your quilt's history and story for future generations.
